headline: Starbucks (SBUX) Is Up 8.2% After Turnaround-Focused Q1 Results And New Growth Initiatives - What's Changed
summary: In late January 2026, Starbucks reported first-quarter revenue of US$9,915.1 million, up from US$9,397.8 million a year earlier, but net income fell to US$293.3 million as the company continued to invest in its turnaround. At the same time, management outlined plans for hundreds of net new stores, a revamped three-tier loyalty program, and a multi-year cost-reduction effort aimed at improving operational efficiency and customer engagement. Against this backdrop, we'll examine how Starbucks'...
